VIEW_SOURCE: CREATE ALGORITHM=UNDEFINED DEFINER=`root`@`localhost` SQL SECURITY DEFINER VIEW `v1_penerimaan_det_belanja` AS select `b`.`Id` AS `Id`,`b`.`refid_terima` AS `refid_terima`,`a`.`c1` AS `c1`,`a`.`c` AS `c`,`a`.`d` AS `d`,`a`.`e` AS `e`,`a`.`e1` AS `e1`,`a`.`asal_usul` AS `asal_usul`,`a`.`sumber_dana` AS `sumber_dana`,`a`.`jns_trans` AS `jns_trans`,`a`.`tgl_buku` AS `tgl_buku`,`a`.`bk` AS `bk`,`a`.`ck` AS `ck`,`a`.`dk` AS `dk`,`a`.`p` AS `p`,`a`.`q` AS `q`,`b`.`jml` AS `jml`,`b`.`kuantitas` AS `kuantitas`,`b`.`harga_satuan` AS `harga_satuan`,`b`.`harga_total` AS `harga_total`,`b`.`dat_tot1` AS `dat_tot1`,`b`.`dat_tot2` AS `dat_tot2`,`b`.`f1` AS `f1`,`b`.`f2` AS `f2`,`b`.`f` AS `f`,`b`.`g` AS `g`,`b`.`h` AS `h`,`b`.`i` AS `i`,`b`.`j` AS `j`,`b`.`j1` AS `j1`,`a`.`sttemp` AS `sttemp`,`a`.`tgl_dokumen_sumber` AS `tgl_dokumen_sumber`,`b`.`sttemp` AS `sttemp_det`,(`b`.`jml` * `b`.`kuantitas`) AS `vol_brg`,((((`b`.`jml` - 1) * `b`.`kuantitas`) * `b`.`dat_tot1`) + `b`.`dat_tot2`) AS `hartot`,`c`.`nm_barang` AS `nm_barang` from ((`t_penerimaan_barang` `a` left join `t_penerimaan_barang_det` `b` on((`a`.`Id` = `b`.`refid_terima`))) left join `ref_barang` `c` on(((`b`.`f1` = `c`.`f1`) and (`b`.`f2` = `c`.`f2`) and (`b`.`f` = `c`.`f`) and (`b`.`g` = `c`.`g`) and (`b`.`h` = `c`.`h`) and (`b`.`i` = `c`.`i`) and (`b`.`j` = `c`.`j`) and (`b`.`j1` = `c`.`j1`))))
